thread.title: Mourinho bemoans lack of respect after being filmed by teens
thread.title_full: Mourinho bemoans lack of respect after being filmed by teens

author: wtopstaff
title: Mourinho bemoans lack of respect after being filmed by teens
text:
Home » News » Sports » Mourinho bemoans lack of… Mourinho bemoans lack of respect after being filmed by teens By The Associated Press October 23, 2015 9:40 am Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho reacts before the Champions League Group G soccer match between Dynamo Kiev and Chelsea FC in Kiev, Ukraine, Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. (AP Photo/Sergei Chuzavkov) 
LONDON (AP) — Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho is hitting out at media outlets for not showing him respect after publishing video of him walking through London filmed by teenagers. 
Mourinho told reporters “private life and stupid things that you bring to light, I don’t like it. So we go to a different level of professional relationship.” 
That means “you don’t get from me (a) good and funny headline” from the news conference ahead of Saturday’s match at West Ham, Mourinho said. 
Pressure is growing on Mourinho, with Chelsea just 12th in the Premier League. 
In separate videos, Mourinho was harangued by teenagers, whose complaints were published by British media outlets. 
Mourinho decried “no respect.” 
Chelsea backed Mourinho saying he was being interrupted while on the phone and the teenagers’ actions go “beyond the grounds of reasonable behavior.” Topics:
